pageContext.claim: “[The trade deal with South Korea] was supposed to give us 250,000 jobs, done by Hillary Clinton. And she was right. It did give 250,000 jobs. So she was right. It gave it to South Korea; not to us.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump doubles the figure for the number of lost jobs for the U.S. free trade deal with South Korea that was claimed by one of his top trade aides. But even that's a dubious number disputed by mainstream economists.
